name: Freepik
description: Freepik is an AI-powered creative suite offering stock assets and tools for designers.
longDescription: Freepik is a comprehensive online platform that provides a vast library of royalty-free stock photos, vectors, videos, and design templates, enhanced by advanced AI tools for image, video, and audio creation and editing. Its mission is to empower creatives, from individual designers to businesses, by offering high-quality resources and intuitive tools to streamline the design process. The platform serves millions of users globally, catering to professionals and hobbyists who need visually appealing content for marketing, branding, or personal projects. Freepik’s AI suite, including tools like the AI Image Generator and Background Remover, allows users to create and customize content efficiently without needing advanced design skills. The platform offers both free and premium plans, ensuring accessibility while providing advanced features for paid subscribers. Freepik also emphasizes data privacy, ensuring user-generated content is secure and not used to train AI models.
features: Freepik’s AI Image Generator creates photorealistic images from text prompts, enabling quick and customized visual content creation.
The Background Remover tool instantly removes image backgrounds, simplifying the process of preparing photos for various design projects.
Freepik Designer allows users to edit and personalize templates for logos, posters, and social media posts with an intuitive online editor.
The AI Video Generator transforms images or prompts into dynamic videos, ideal for creating engaging ads or social media content.
The platform offers over 250 million royalty-free stock assets, including vectors, photos, and PSDs, for diverse creative needs.
The Reimagine tool generates multiple style variations of an image in real-time, enhancing creative flexibility.
AI-powered Retouch and Upscale tools refine image details and enhance resolution up to 10K for high-quality outputs.
Custom Characters ensure consistent character designs across multiple images or videos, streamlining cohesive branding.

faqs.question: What is Freepik used for?
faqs.answer: Freepik provides royalty-free stock assets and AI-powered tools for creating and editing images, videos, and audio, ideal for designers and marketers.

faqs.question: Does Freepik offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Freepik offers a free plan with access to many stock assets and basic tools, though attribution is required and some features are limited.

faqs.question: Is attribution required for Freepik’s free assets?
faqs.answer: For free plans and Essential Team plans, users must attribute Freepik by including a visible credit like 'Designed by Freepik' with a link.

faqs.question: Can I use Freepik assets for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: Yes, paid plans include a commercial license for AI-generated and stock content, while free plans are limited to personal use with attribution.

faqs.question: How does Freepik ensure data privacy?
faqs.answer: Freepik ensures user content is private, not using inputs or outputs to train AI models, with strict agreements to protect data.

faqs.question: What AI tools does Freepik offer?
faqs.answer: Freepik offers AI tools like Image Generator, Video Generator, Background Remover, Retouch, and Upscale for creating and editing content.

faqs.question: Can I create videos with Freepik?
faqs.answer: Yes, Freepik’s AI Video Generator allows users to create videos from images or prompts, with modes like cinematic and animated.
